The seuen sorowes that women haue when theyr husbandes be deade. Compyled by Robert Copland Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547.
[24] p. : ill.
In Lothburi ouer agaynste Sainct Margarytes church by me Wyllyam Copland], [[Imprented at London : [ca. 1565]]
In verse. Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC. Signatures: A-C⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
